name: Margherita Pizza
details: Classic margherita pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
details: Spicy pepperoni with mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
details: BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, red onions, and cilantro.

name: Caesar Salad
details: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Greek Salad
details: Tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, olives, feta cheese, and Greek dressing.

name: Garden Salad
details: Mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and your choice of dressing.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
details: Spaghetti pasta with a rich meat sauce made with ground beef and tomatoes.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
details: Fettuccine pasta with a creamy Alfredo sauce and parmesan cheese.

name: Penne Arrabbiata
details: Penne pasta in a spicy tomato sauce with garlic and chili peppers.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
details: Grilled chicken pieces in a creamy tomato sauce with spices.

name: Butter Chicken
details: Chicken cooked in a rich and creamy tomato-based sauce.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
details: Cottage cheese cubes in a buttery tomato gravy.

name: Sushi Platter
details: Assorted sushi including nigiri, sashimi, and rolls.

name: Ramen
details: Noodles in a savory broth with pork, egg, and vegetables.

name: Tempura
details: Lightly battered and fried seafood and vegetables.

name: Beef Tacos
details: Soft corn tortillas filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, and cheese.

name: Chicken Burrito
details: Flour tortilla filled with grilled chicken, rice, beans, and salsa.

name: Vegetarian Quesadilla
details: Flour tortilla with melted cheese, peppers, onions, and mushrooms.

name: Cheeseburger
details: Beef patty with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles on a bun.

name: BBQ Ribs
details: Slow-cooked ribs with BBQ sauce, served with coleslaw.
